```{r, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(readr)

# read package list
pack_list <- read_tsv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sneumann/metaRbolomics/master/connectivity/AllMetaRbolomicsTables.csv",
                      col_types=cols(
                                       Table = col_character(),
                                       Section = col_character(),
                                       Functionalities = col_character(),
                                       Package = col_character(),
                                       Code_link = col_character(),
                                       Repo = col_character()
                                     )
                     )

metaRbolomics_show_table <- function(table_text = "Table 1:"){
    require(DT)
    require(dplyr)
    
    caption <- pack_list$Table %>% 
                    unique() %>% 
                    grep(table_text, ., value = TRUE)
    
    pack_list %>% 
        filter(grepl(table_text, Table)) %>% 
        mutate(Package = paste0('<a target=_blank href=', Code_link, '>', Package,'</a>' )) %>% 
        select(-Table, -Code_link) %>% 
        
        datatable(pack_list, 
                      extensions = "RowGroup", 
                      options = list(rowGroup=list(dataSrc=0),
                                     ordering=FALSE,
                                     columnDefs = list(list(visible=FALSE, targets=c(0))), # hide rownames
                                     pageLength = -1, # show all entries
                                     dom = 'ft' # remove nagivation
                                     ),
                      rownames= FALSE, 
                      escape = FALSE,
                      fillContainer=FALSE,
                      caption = caption
                      )
}

```
